adrFormatAddress: 1120 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: He saved my life when I had colon cancer at the age of 25. That was over 10 years ago and I am alive and thriving thanks to his outstanding care. Thank you always Dr. Martz!

text.text: He saved my life when I had colon cancer at the age of 25. That was over 10 years ago and I am alive and thriving thanks to his outstanding care. Thank you always Dr. Martz!

originalText.text:
No one tops this doctor in all of New York and Florida for his expertise! Exceptional medical diagnosis ( the others still figuring it out), Exceptional outcome, always caring ,staff is patient and extraordinary in their help! Dr Martz will make a call to find out on his own!
Who does that!? And he takes the time to smile and listen to his patients.
He understands patients needs go beyond what he does in the office.
My family is grateful to him and his staff for getting it right each time! Gd bless him!

originalText.text: Very good doctor . He made me feel comfortable and took his time to explain my issue. He gave me very good recommendations. He really comes across as caring and knowledgeable.

text.text: Very good doctor . He made me feel comfortable and took his time to explain my issue. He gave me very good recommendations. He really comes across as caring and knowledgeable.

originalText.text: Dr. Martz was my Surgeon recently for a robotic operation. I feel extremely fortunate & blessed that I had such an outstanding doctor. This was my first major operation ever & at the age of 73, my nerves were all over the place. Dr. Martz made me feel calm from the first time we met, and explained everything that was going to done in a way that took away my fears. During my time in the hospital, I saw him & his wonderful team everyday & they addressed every single concern in a way that made me feel like I was their only patient. Outstanding, Fabulous, Extremely Detailed, Over the top in every way imaginable cannot accurately describe how amazing I think Dr. Martz is. He makes you feel comfortable enough to leave your worries at the door & he makes sure that your experience is as stressfree as possible. And the best part, was when he received my Pathology report a few days after the operation, and immediately called me to tell me that there wasn't any trace of cancer, which had been a possibility.. THANK YOU DR. MARTZ FOR BEING SUCH A TRULY FABULOUS DOCTOR!!!

originalText.text:
After my second colon cancer diagnosis within 1 yr from the 1st operation. I was referred to this miracle of a doctor by my 1st surgeon in 2011. Dr. Joseph Martz is a gift from God.  His kind and gentle manner. His genuine concern...
I can go on forever. He had been in my life for 8 yrs. 2019 I was officially declared cancer free. Our journey together along with his wonderful team and P.A's were a blessing. He saved my life. I will never forget him or Vicky. Thank u Dr. Martz and your brilliant mind and remarkable hands!
I am and continue to be Eternally Grateful!!
